prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that looks like a haunted doll with jagged edges and glowing red eyes.
Imagine a spooky Pokemon that has a shadowy presence and a mischievous grin, perfect for Halloween.
Design a dark-type Pokemon that resembles a stitched-up puppet, with vibrant pink accents and a creepy aura.
Show me a ghostly creature with flowing limbs and a haunted charm that can scare its opponents.
Generate a Pokemon that embodies the essence of a vengeful spirit, with a hauntingly playful demeanor.
Make a spooky Pokemon that combines elements of a doll and a ghost, featuring a sinister smile.
Give me a visually striking Pokemon that has a unique design, resembling a cursed object with eerie colors.
